scripts.preview:static: cd fpj-storytelling/next-app && SET STATIC_PREVIEW=1&& npx next build && npx next export
scripts.reinstall:next: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "cd fpj-storytelling/next-app; if(Test-Path node_modules){Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules}; npm install"
scripts.rebuild:fresh: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force fpj-storytelling/next-app/.next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd fpj-storytelling/next-app; npx next build"
scripts.doctor:next: powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "node -v; npm -v; cd fpj-storytelling/next-app; try { npm ls next react react-dom } catch { Write-Host 'npm ls completed with non-zero code (some peer warnings)'; }"
